pageProduct.name: Avene Cleanance Women Smoothing Night Care 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eau Thermale Avène Cleanance WOMEN Smoothing Night Care care helps to reduce blemishes, spots and residual marks, and helps to smooth the skin texture thanks to its unique combination of ingredients:
• Retinaldehyde (Pro-Vitamin A): Vitamin A derivative, has a rejuvenating effect which helps to unblock pores, reduce residual marks and provides added anti-ageing bene?ts.
• Synovea: helps to reduce blemishes and limit sebum oxidation, anti-blemish and antioxidant active ingredient
• X-Pressin: smooths skin texture.

50% reduction of blemishes*


*Tolerance and efficacy study carried out under dermatological and ophthalmological control) on 41 women for 57 days. 1 application a day on the face in the evening.

Warnings

For adult skin prone to blemishes, spots and blackheads, hormonal acne, uneven skin texture, residual marks.

Common Uses

For adult skin prone to blemishes, spots and blackheads, hormonal acne, uneven skin texture, residual marks.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. ISODODECANE. DIMETHICONE. GLYCERIN. PENTYLENE GLYCOL. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. WATER (AQUA). SQUALANE. GLYCERYL STEARATE. REG-100 STEARATE. HEXYLRESORCINOL. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. ALGIN. ARACHIDYL ALCOHOL. ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE. BEHENYL ALCOHOL. BENZOIC ACID. BHT. CAPRYLYL GLYCOL. CARBOMBER. DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER. DIMETHICONOL. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE. HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER. PAPAIN. PEG-7 TRIMETHYLOLPROPANE COCONUT ETHER. RED 33 (CI 17200). RETINAL. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. STEARYL ALCOHOL. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the evening, after using Eau Thermale Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel, to the face, neck and décolleté.
Not suitable for use while pregnant or breastfeeding. Avoid sun exposure and apply sunscreen daily.
